com.foreach.across.modules.dynamicforms.domain.definition

Class DynamicDefinitionService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.foreach.across.modules.dynamicforms.domain.definition.DynamicDefinitionService

  • @Service
public class DynamicDefinitionService
extends Object
    Service class to find DynamicDefinition and DynamicDefinitionVersion object by DynamicDefinitionId.
    Since:
    0.0.1
    Author:
    Marc Vanbrabant, Arne Vandamme

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DynamicDefinitionService(DynamicDefinitionRepository definitionRepository, DynamicDefinitionVersionRepository definitionVersionRepository, DynamicDefinitionTypeConfigurationRegistry typeConfigurationRegistry) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deleteDefinition(@NonNull DynamicDefinition definition)
      Perform a full delete of a DynamicDefinition, this will delete all documents and versions linked to this definition, and finally delete the definition and its versions.
      DynamicDefinition findDefinition(@NonNull DynamicDefinitionId id)
      Find the DynamicDefinition represented by the DynamicDefinitionId.
      DynamicDefinitionVersion findDefinitionVersion(@NonNull DynamicDefinitionId id)
      Find the DynamicDefinitionVersion represented by the DynamicDefinitionId.

    • Method Detail

      • findDefinitionVersion

        public DynamicDefinitionVersion findDefinitionVersion(@NonNull
                                                      @NonNull DynamicDefinitionId id)
        Find the DynamicDefinitionVersion represented by the DynamicDefinitionId. If DynamicDefinitionId.isForVersion() returns false, then the latest version will be returned (if there is one).
        Parameters:
        id - for the definition version
        Returns:
        definition version or null if none found

      • findDefinition

        public DynamicDefinition findDefinition(@NonNull
                                        @NonNull DynamicDefinitionId id)
        Find the DynamicDefinition represented by the DynamicDefinitionId.
        Parameters:
        id - for the definition
        Returns:
        definition or null if none found

      • deleteDefinition

        @Transactional
public void deleteDefinition(@NonNull
                                            @NonNull DynamicDefinition definition)
        Perform a full delete of a DynamicDefinition, this will delete all documents and versions linked to this definition, and finally delete the definition and its versions.
        Parameters:
        definition - to delete
